select GAMENO, TABLENO, GAMETYPE, MEMBERNUM, GAMEDATE, GAMETIME, STARTTIME, ENDTIME, PAYSTATUS, PAYTYPE, PAYDATE, INCOME, PAYMONEY, PAUSESTART, PAUSESTOP, PAUSETIME, SETNO, ROUND((sysdate-STARTTIME) * 24 * 60 * 60, 2)- PAUSETIME as secondsToTime from GAMES where GAMENO = (select max(GAMENO) from GAMES where TABLENO = #{tableNo})

select GAMENO, TABLENO, GAMETYPE, MEMBERNUM, GAMEDATE, GAMETIME, STARTTIME, ENDTIME, PAYSTATUS, PAYTYPE, PAYDATE, INCOME, PAYMONEY, PAUSESTART, PAUSESTOP, PAUSETIME, SETNO, ROUND((PAUSESTART-STARTTIME) * 24 * 60 * 60, 2)- PAUSETIME as secondsToTime from GAMES where GAMENO = (select max(GAMENO) from GAMES where TABLENO = #{tableNo})

mapper.update: update GAMES set STARTTIME = sysdate, PAUSETIME = 0 where GAMENO = #{gameNo}
update CUETABLE set STATUS = 1 where TABLENO = #{tableNo}
update GAMES set PAUSESTART = sysdate where GAMENO = #{gameNo}
update CUETABLE set STATUS = 2 where TABLENO = #{tableNo}
update GAMES set PAUSESTOP = sysdate where GAMENO = #{gameNo}
update GAMES set PAUSETIME = PAUSETIME + ROUND((PAUSESTOP-PAUSESTART) * 24 * 60 * 60, 2) where GAMENO = #{gameNo}
update CUETABLE set STATUS = 0 where TABLENO = #{tableNo}
update GAMES set ENDTIME = sysdate, GAMESTATUS = 1 where GAMENO = #{gameNo}
update GAMES set GAMETIME = ROUND((ENDTIME-STARTTIME) * 24 * 60 * 60, 2) - PAUSETIME where GAMENO = #{gameNo}
update PLAYS set RECORD = #{record}, ACTIVEAVERAGE = #{activeAverage}, ENDTIME = sysdate where PLAYNO = #{playNo}

update plays set playTime = (select round((p.endtime - g.starttime)*24*60*60)-g.PAUSETIME as playTime from games g, plays p where g.gameNo = p.gameNo and p.playNo = #{playNo}) where playno = #{playNo}
mapper.select: select PLAYNO, USERNO, GAMENO, PLAYTIME, RECORD, CURRENTAVERAGE, ACTIVEAVERAGE, ENDTIME, ORDERNO from Plays where PLAYNO = #{playNo}
mapper.update: update GAMES set ENDTIME = sysdate, GAMESTATUS = 0, PAUSETIME = 0 where GAMENO = #{gameNo}
update GAMES set GAMETIME = ROUND((ENDTIME-STARTTIME) * 24 * 60 * 60, 2) where GAMENO = #{gameNo}
update PLAYS set RECORD = ORDERNO+1, ACTIVEAVERAGE = CURRENTAVERAGE, ENDTIME = sysdate, PLAYTIME = (select GAMETIME from Games where gameNo = #{gameNo}) where GAMENO = #{gameNo}
mapper.select: select p.PLAYNO, p.USERNO, u.nick, p.PLAYTIME, p.RECORD, p.CURRENTAVERAGE, p.ACTIVEAVERAGE, p.ENDTIME, p.ORDERNO from PLAYS p, users u where GAMENO = #{gameNo} AND p.USERNO = u.USERNO order by RECORD ASC
